result.content:

 Set Up: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.SetUp (edit)
Import
fitnesse.fixtures

SetUp

BUG. Thanks John Goodsen.


If a virtual page includes another that is in the same virtual subwiki, it should be able to find it remotely.

Page creator.
Page name. Page contents. Page attributes. valid?
VirtualPage !contents VirtualWiki=http://localhost:8080/FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage true

Response Requester.
uri valid?
VirtualPage.IncludingPage true

Response Examiner
type pattern matches? wrapped html?
contents included page true   
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 4395
Connection: close
Server: FitNesse-v20091014
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
<html>
	<head>
		<title>VirtualPage.IncludingPage</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse.css" media="screen"/>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse_print.css" media="print"/>
		<script src="/files/javascript/fitnesse.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	</head>
	<body class="virtual">
		<div class="sidebar">
			<div class="art_niche" onclick="document.location='FrontPage'"></div>
			<div class="actions">
				<!--Where Used button-->
				<a href="http://localhost:8080/FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.IncludingPage?whereUsed" target="newWindow" accesskey="w">Where Used</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Files button-->
				<a href="/files" target="newWindow" accesskey="f">Files</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Recent Changes button-->
				<a href="/RecentChanges" target="newWindow" accesskey="">Recent Changes</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--User Guide button-->
				<a href=".FitNesse.UserGuide" target="newWindow" accesskey="">User Guide</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Test History button-->
				<a href="?testHistory" target="newWindow" accesskey="">Test History</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="mainbar">
			<div class="header">
				<a href="/VirtualPage">VirtualPage</a>.
				<br/>
<span class="page_title">IncludingPage</span>
<a style="font-size:small;" onclick="popup('addChildPopup')"> [add child]</a>			</div>
			<div class="main"><div class="included">
	<div style="float: right;" class="meta"><a href="javascript:expandAll();">Expand All</a> | <a href="javascript:collapseAll();">Collapse All</a></div>
	<a href="javascript:toggleCollapsable('6073000710911083675');">
		<img src="/files/images/collapsableOpen.gif" class="left" id="img6073000710911083675"/>
	</a>
 <span class="meta">Included page: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.IncludedPage<a title="create page" href="FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.IncludedPage?edit&nonExistent=true">[?]</a> (edit)<a title="create page" href="http://localhost:8080/FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage..FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.IncludedPage?edit&nonExistent=true" target=".FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.IncludedPage">[?]</a></span>
	<div class="collapsable" id="6073000710911083675">the included page 00bF<br/>
</div>
</div>
.FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.IncludingPage.ChildIncludingPage<a title="create page" href="FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.IncludingPage.ChildIncludingPage?edit&nonExistent=true">[?]</a><br/>
<br/>
<div class="footer">
</div>
<div id="addChildPopup" class="popup_window">
  <div class="popup_title">Add Child Page to IncludingPage</div>
  <div class="popup_content">
    <form action="VirtualPage.IncludingPage" method="get">
      <input type="hidden" name="responder" value="addChild"/>
      <table border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" height="100%">
        <tr>
          <td>
            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Normal"/> Normal<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Test"/> Test<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Suite"/> Suite<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Default" checked="checked"/> Default<br/>

          </td>
          <td>
            <table border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td><label for="childName">Name</label></td?
                <td><input size="50" id="childName" type="text" name="name"/></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td><label for="childContent">Content</label></td>
                <td><input size="50" id="childContent" type="text" name="content" value="!contents"/></td>
              </tr>
            </table>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td></td>
          <td>
            <input TYPE="button" VALUE="Cancel" onClick="popdown('addChildPopup')"/>
            <input value="Add" type="submit"/>
          </td>
        </tr>
      </table>
    </form>
  </div>
</div></div>
		</div>
	</body>
</html>
